== Problem ==
----
Create a simple SVG graphic


== Solution ==
--------------

Suppose you have defined a SVG zone in your HTML document with

{{{
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" 
    width="400" height="300" style="border-style:solid;border-width:1;border-color:#000;">
  <g id="panel">
  </g>
</svg>
}}}

Here is how you can insert a SVG graphic in the "panel" :

{{{
import svg
svg_text = svg.text('old',x=20,y=45,
            font_size=20,text_anchor="middle",
            style={"stroke":"navy", 'fill':"navy"})
svg_rect = svg.rect(x=10,y=60,width=30,height=50,
    style={"fill":"rgb(0,0,255)","stroke-width":1,"stroke":"rgb(0,0,0)"})
    
panel = doc['panel']
panel <= svg_text + svg_rect # add SVG elements to panel
# reset text
svg_text.text = "new"
}}}
